^ As of the date of this Draft Red Herring Prospectus, our Board has approved the appointment of Sachin Nandgaonkar, Anupa Rajiv Sahney and Alampallam Ramakrishnan Narayanaswamy as Non-Executive Independent Director (Additional) and their regularisation remains subject to the approval of our Shareholders.

**Pravin Agarwal** is the Chairman and Non-Executive Director of our Company. He holds a bachelor's degree in commerce from Patna University. He has an experience of 29 years as a director in overseeing and handling management of companies. Prior to joining our Company, he was associated with East-North Interconnection Company Limited, Sterlite Technologies Limited and Speedon Network Limited. He has been associated with our Company since May 5, 2015.

**Pratik Pravin Agarwal** is the Managing Director of our Company. He holds a bachelor of science in economics from the University of Pennsylvania, and a master's degree in business administration from London Business School, University of London. He is a member of Confederation of Indian Industries, IMC Chamber of Commerce and Indian Chambers of Commerce and Industry. He has an experience of 15 years as a director in overseeing and handling management of companies. Prior to joining our Company, he was associated with Sterlite Technologies Limited, Sterlite Ports Limited, Vizag General Cargo Berth Limited, and Speedon Network Limited. He has been awarded the 40 under 40 Award and the CEO of the Year award by the Economic Times. He is associated with our Company since June 1, 2016.

**Reshu Madan** is the Whole-time Director and Chief Executive Officer of our Company. He holds a bachelor's degree in engineering (mechanical branch) from Bharati Vidyapeeth College of Engineering, the University of Pune, and a post-graduate diploma in business management from the Institute of Management Technology, Ghaziabad. He has 29 years of experience in power and infrastructure sector. Prior to joining our Company, he was associated with the Crompton Greaves Limited and TBEA Energy (India) Private Limited. He is associated with our Company since October 18, 2018.

**Alipt Sharma** is the Nominee Director (Non-Executive Non-Independent) of our Company. He holds a bachelor's of arts (honours) in economics from University of Delhi, and a masters degree in management from Indian School of Business, Hyderabad. He is a qualified chartered accountant from the Institute of Chartered Accountants of India. He is associated as a partner with South Asia Advisors LLP, a sub-advisor to GEF Capital Partners. Prior to joining our Company, he was associated with AMP Capital Advisors India Private Ltd as an investment manager, Ambit Corporate Finance Pte. Limited in its corporate finance business and Arthur Andersen & Co. He is associated with our Company since December 12, 2024.

**Frederic Andre M Trefois** is the Non-Executive Independent Director of our Company. He holds a diploma in civil engineering from University of Liege. He has an experience of 5 years in overseeing and handling management of companies.
